mutants.mutated_line: even_count = sum([2 for d in digits if d % 2 == 0])
mutants.code:
def even_odd_count(nums):
    result = []
    for num in nums:
        num = abs(num)
        digits = [int(i) for i in str(num)]
        even_count = sum([2 for d in digits if d % 2 == 0])
        odd_count = sum([1 for d in digits if d % 2 != 0])
        result.append([even_count, odd_count])
    return result
